sqlMap.select:
SELECT A.* FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, S.* FROM ( SELECT USAGE_YEAR , USAGE_QU , USAGE_MT , ASSETS_USAGE_SEQ , MNG_YEAR , MNG_NO , MNG_CNT , PRT_AT_CODE , USAGE_PRPOS_CD , REQST_ENTRPS_CD , ( SELECT E.ENTRPS_NM FROM ENTRPS_INFO_F E WHERE E.ENTRPSCD = REQST_ENTRPS_CD AND ROWNUM = 1 ) REQST_ENTRPS_CD_NM , USAGE_CND , EXEMPT_SE , NVL(FEE,0) FEE , NVL(RDCXPT_FEE,0) RDCXPT_FEE , UPD_USR , TO_CHAR(UPDT_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') UPDT_DT , TO_CHAR(USAGE_PD_FROM, 'YYYY-MM-DD') USAGE_PD_FROM , TO_CHAR(USAGE_PD_TO, 'YYYY-MM-DD') USAGE_PD_TO , GIS_ASSETS_CD , GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD , QUAY_CD FROM USAGE_PD_BY_STATS_F WHERE QUAY_CD = 'X'
AND PRT_AT_CODE = #sPrtAtCode#
AND REQST_ENTRPS_CD = #sEntrpscd#
AND USAGE_PD_FROM >= TO_DATE(#sGrUsagePdFrom#||'000000','yyyy-mm-ddhh24miss')
AND USAGE_PD_TO <= TO_DATE(#sGrUsagePdTo#||'235959','yyyy-mm-ddhh24miss')
ORDER BY USAGE_YEAR, USAGE_MT DESC ) S ) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #recordCountPerPage# and RNUM > #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM USAGE_PD_BY_STATS_F WHERE QUAY_CD = 'X'
AND PRT_AT_CODE = #sPrtAtCode#
AND REQST_ENTRPS_CD = #sEntrpscd#
AND USAGE_PD_FROM >= TO_DATE(#sGrUsagePdFrom#||'000000','yyyy-mm-ddhh24miss')
AND USAGE_PD_TO <= TO_DATE(#sGrUsagePdTo#||'235959','yyyy-mm-ddhh24miss')
ORDER BY USAGE_YEAR, USAGE_MT DESC

SELECT TRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(COUNT(*),0), '999,999,999,999')) SUM_CNT , TRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(SUM(FEE),0), '999,999,999,999')) SUM_FEE , TRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(SUM(RDCXPT_FEE),0), '999,999,999,999')) SUM_RDCXPT_FEE FROM USAGE_PD_BY_STATS_F WHERE QUAY_CD = 'X'
AND PRT_AT_CODE = #sPrtAtCode#
AND REQST_ENTRPS_CD = #sEntrpscd#
AND USAGE_PD_FROM >= TO_DATE(#sGrUsagePdFrom#||'000000','yyyy-mm-ddhh24miss')
AND USAGE_PD_TO <= TO_DATE(#sGrUsagePdTo#||'235959','yyyy-mm-ddhh24miss')
ORDER BY USAGE_YEAR, USAGE_MT DESC
